com.github.woooking.qa_sorting.api

类 QAServer

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.server.HandlerContainer, org.eclipse.jetty.util.Attributes, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Container, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Destroyable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle

    public class QAServer
extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.Server
    The main class of the QA server. A QA server can handle a few services throw method addService(String, IIndexer, int). SOServer is a good example to start with.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • QAServer

        public QAServer(int port,
                java.lang.String dirPath)
        Create a QA server, specific the port, the path contains web pages and the query url.
        参数:
        port - the port which the QA server listen on (0 for a random port)
        dirPath - the path of directory where web pages are

    • 方法详细资料

      • addService

        public <T extends IDocument> QAServer addService(java.lang.String url,
                                                 IIndexer<T> indexer,
                                                 int limit)
        Add a service to the server.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the document
        参数:
        url - the url for the service
        indexer - the indexer specifics how to get document from query
        limit - the max number of documents (0 means no limit)
        返回:
        this server

      • luanch

        public void luanch()
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Luanch the server.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception when launching the server
